business_group.description: The business group that the database is associated with, e.g., compliance, legal.

key_contact_information.description: Contact information for individuals responsible for the database management.

name.description: The name of the key contact.

email.description: The email address of the key contact.

entitlements.description: Access entitlements for users and service accounts, with possible extensions for audit trails and access logs.

user_or_service_account.description: The user or service account with access entitlements.

entitlements.description: Specific entitlements granted, e.g., read, write, admin, with possible extensions for viewing relationships or ownership details.
